{{ menuItem.id }}

{{ child.id }}

{{ menuItems | json }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from './services/data.service'; import { IMenuItem } from './libs/models/help-menu-item.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'service'; menuItems: IMenuItem[] = []; constructor(private dataService: DataService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.dataService.getData().subscribe((menuItems: IMenuItem[]) => { this.menuItems = menuItems; }); } }
